mapper.select: select cl_num, cl_name, to_char(cl_startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') as cl_startdate, to_char(cl_enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') as cl_enddate , cl_type, cl_contents, cl_color, c.e_id from calendar c inner join employee e on c.e_id = e.e_id
mapper.insert:
select clnum_seq.nextval from dual
insert into calendar (cl_num, cl_name, cl_startdate, cl_enddate, cl_type, cl_contents, cl_color, e_id) values (#{cl_num},#{cl_name},#{cl_startdate},#{cl_enddate},#{cl_type},#{cl_contents},#{cl_color},#{e_id})
mapper.update: update calendar set cl_name=#{cl_name}, cl_startdate=#{cl_startdate}, cl_enddate=#{cl_enddate}, cl_type=#{cl_type}, cl_contents=#{cl_contents}, cl_color=#{cl_color} where cl_num=#{cl_num}
